alert.note: Alert for Big Stone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 21 at 9:15PM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Big Stone County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until noon CST Wednesday. For the Blizzard Warning, from noon Wednesday to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes this week. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero will cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1.
